oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Intersection of Capitol Boulevard and Church Street, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the intersection of Capitol Boulevard and Church Street, not dated. Visible buildings and businesses include Karl's Shoes, Baker's Shoe Store, and the Sam Davis Hotel. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); Karl’s Shoes (Nashville, Tenn.); Baker’s Shoe Store (Nashville, Tenn.); Sam Davis Hotel (Nashville, Tenn.);
